title: Tomorrow is my sister's birthday. How can I make it special? - Quora

response.answer_text: Organize a surprise birthday party for her and invite her BFFs. Add her favorite food to the menu and bring her the gift she is looking for. Maybe she might have told you that she needs a phone or maybe something that she needs badly? Bring it for her!Decorate her room with flowers, balloons etc. Do it when she is sleeping, so when she gets up, there is a surprise for her. Or you can also do it when she is went to her college or somewhere out.Go creative and make her some handmade birthday gifts or birthday cards.
